articles.title: Sex after menopause: How women can have a great sex life even after menstruation stops - check doctor`s adv... - Zee News
articles.description: Menopause is the natural biological process characterized by the cessation or stopping of a womans menstrual cycle, marking the end of fertility. The general onset is observed in middle-aged women, i.e., between 40 to 50 years of age.
